features: Persil laundry detergent contains a powerful stain-fighting combination for a premium clean
Great for everyday laundry and to help fight tough stains
This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil liquid detergent, so you don’t have to use as much to experience premium clean
Persil laundry soap has been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including high efficiency (HE) washers
You receive: one 82.5 fluid ounce bottle of Persil 2X Concentrated liquid laundry detergent in the Intense Fresh scent, enough for 110 loads.
body.description: For clean, bright, and fresh laundry, use Persil Intense Fresh laundry detergent liquid. Persil Power-Liquid Intense Fresh gives you the stain-fighting power of Persil Original detergent liquid with an extremely fresh scent. Intense Fresh works great for everyday laundry, helping brighten and whiten your clothes and fight tough stains. Experience an exceptional deep clean every time with our Intense Fresh laundry soap. Persil laundry detergent works in all washing machines, including high efficiency (HE) washers and cleans effectively in all water temperatures, even cold water. Use with Snuggle laundry softener and laundry scent boosters to round out your laundry supplies. Persil laundry detergent is great for all types of clothes, including activewear. This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil liquid detergent, so you only need to use half as much to experience premium clean. Persil 2X concentrated detergent comes in a laundry detergent container that is made for delivery. This package includes one 82.5 fluid ounce bottle of Persil 2X concentrated liquid laundry detergent in Intense Fresh scent, enough for 110 regular loads of laundry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More about Persil Proclean HE Compatible Persil Proclean laundry detergents have been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including HE. With a low suds, clean rinse formula, Persil Proclean laundry detergents help your brights stay bright and your whites stay white. Power-Liquid Persil Power-Liquid detergent is formulated to deliver a deep clean for life's messy moments and a powerful freshness that last long after wash. Proclean DISCS Each pre-measured DISCS detergent capsule combines powerful stain removal, long-lasting freshness, fiber care, and provides a deep clean. Deep Clean The Persil formula contains stainfighting enzymes specially designed to break down stains and deliver an exceptional deep clean. So when stains go deep, Persil detergent goes deeper.

Persil Original 2X Laundry Detergent Persil Intense Fresh 2X Laundry Detergent Persil Odor Fighter 2X Laundry Detergent Persil OXI Power 2X Laundry Detergent Persil Original DISCS Laundry Pacs Persil OXI Power DISCS Laundry Pacs Key Benefit Deep Clean of Visible and Invisible Dirt Extremely Fresh Scent Odor Prevention and Odor Elimination Technology Oxi Power Technology Deep Clean of Visible and Invisible Dirt Oxi Power Technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best detergent out there
reviews.reviewText: The smell is wonderful. The price is reasonable and it cleans my clothes better than any other detergent I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This concentrated version is amazing. I use less than recommended and still get a nice sudsy wash. Plus, it smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I had tried Persil SO much sooner!!!
reviews.reviewText: I used to use all of the expensive, mediocre, “trendy” detergents that smell decent, but they really did not clean well at all. After years of struggling using those, I finally thought I’d figured out a combination of products that worked, even though it has been SO expensive and time-consuming, even just to order the products and have them all at hand. I had heard about how amazing person was years and years ago, but I just brushed it off and could not believe that something so cheap could work so well. Lo and behold, my “favorite” detergent is out of stock everywhere so I finally, FINALLY tried Persil.Well, I am ashamed that I was so wasteful and I wish now that I had discovered for myself how amazing Persil detergent is so long ago. This particular one is my absolute favorite scented laundry detergent there is, and this stuff actually works! The oxi kind with the orange on the label is my other favorite.. but seriously…it just blows my mind!!! try it if you’re on the fence, it’s so inexpensive compared to products that don’t do half of what this stuff does. Liquid gold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never used concentrated detergent
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of using concentrated detergent because I’m used to using about a cup of fluid, but this definitely works exactly like the watered down version, except you use less detergent. I believe it’s cheaper as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Persil Laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: I've used this laundry detergent for years, it works great on whites without bleach. Just be careful not to use on colored clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great scent and you only need to use a little. This is a popular brand in Europe and I love that I can buy it here in on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never Tried Before
reviews.reviewText: This soap is fantastic. I had seen it but never tried it. Some stores don’t carry it so then one day saw on here and bought. It is excellent and really cleans like they say it does. I’ll never buy anything else. But I would like to try the one with oxygen in it now.
Love this soap, cleans well and smells great

I made a decision to purchase this one until I read lots of reviews, and I'm not disappointed. I love the scent. Laundry smell clean and fresh every time, contrary to some reviews that they don't like the scent. And it's cheaper too that's why I ordered to try. It didn't disappoint. Love it.
This is very good it gets my laundry clean and smell great

Heard this was best but was pricey. Now price has leveled out with top brands and this is my 1st time I like it alot, it's exactly what you want and need. Cleans out all kinds of stains easily, smells great. I think it's called fresh burst. I heard the original wasn't nice at all. Well worth the money as you use very little per load highly recommend

I have always used persil for my laundry and have always been satisfied. This time I wanted to try the concentrated and intense scented version.The only reason for the 4 stars is that I bought this and expected it to be 2 times concentrated as advertised but ended up using the same amount of detergent as the non concentrated version to get to same level of cleanliness. Also I found it few days later selling for $9.99 at Walmart. Besides that it’s certainly a great laundry detergent.
